snippet: Orders for factory goods fell 0.6 percent in April from March levels, the Commerce Department reported.
abstract: Commerce Department reports orders for factory goods fell 0.6 percent in April.
lead_paragraph: Orders for factory goods fell 0.6 percent in April from March levels, the Commerce Department reported.

headline.seo: April Factory Orders Fall in 2nd Consecutive Drop
headline.main: April Factory Orders Fall 0.6% in 2nd Consecutive Decline
headline.print_headline: April Factory Orders Fall 0.6% in 2nd Consecutive Decline
